title: Special Tactical Reserve for International Key Emergencies (Earth-616)

[[Michael (RCX) (Earth-616)|Agent Michael]], [[Matthew (Gabriel) (Earth-616)|Agent Matthew]] | Allies = [[Brian Braddock (Earth-616)|Captain Britain (Brian Braddock)]], [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] | Enemies = [[Vixen (British Crimelord) (Earth-616)|Vixen]], [[Slaymaster (Earth-616)|Slaymaster]], [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]], [[Tod Radcliffe (Earth-616)|Tod Radcliffe]], [[Radically Advanced Ideas in Destruction (Earth-616)|R.A.I.D]] | Origin = [[United Kingdom|British]] Intelligence Agency | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Gary Friedrich; Larry Lieber | First = Captain Britain #17 | History = S.T.R.I.K.E, initially led by [[Lance Hunter (Earth-616)|Commander Lance Hunter]], was a [[United Kingdom|British]] intelligence agency dedicated to dealing with threats beyond the remit of the regular intelligence services. The agency assisted [[Brian Braddock (Earth-616)|Captain Britain]] and [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] in thwarting the [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]]'s attempt to take over the country with the help of the treacherous Deputy Director [[Tod Radcliffe (Earth-616)|Tod Radcliffe]].{{r|Captain Britain #17|27}} Later, S.T.R.I.K.E recruited a 'PSI Division' composed of powerful telepaths to assist them, but when the agency was itself infiltrated and taken over by the crime lord [[Vixen (British Crimelord) (Earth-616)|Vixen]], she hired the assassin [[Slaymaster (Earth-616)|Slaymaster]] to hunt down and kill the telepaths as they were the only ones who could expose her. Slaymaster murdered several of the telepaths including [[Kevin Mulhearn (Earth-616)|Kevin]] and [[Vicki Reppion (Earth-616)|Vicki]], but [[Thomas Lennox (Earth-616)|Tom Lennox]], [[Alison Double (Earth-616)|Alison Double]] and [[Elizabeth Braddock (Earth-616)|Elizabeth Braddock]] escaped thanks to the arrival of Braddock's brother Brian, AKA Captain Britain. S.T.R.I.K.E was subsequently replaced by the [[Resources Control Executive (Earth-616)|RCX (Resources Control Executive)]]. ==Members== {{Main|Special Tactical Reserve for International Key Emergencies (Earth-616)/Members}} {{Seealso|:Category:Special Tactical Reserve for International Key Emergencies members}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S.T.R.I.K.E.
